io.advantageous.qbit

Interface Factory


  • public interface Factory
    Main factory for QBit. This gets used internally to createWithWorkers / parse methods.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createMethodCallToBeParsedFromBody

        default MethodCall<java.lang.Object> createMethodCallToBeParsedFromBody(java.lang.String address,
                                                                        java.lang.String returnAddress,
                                                                        java.lang.String objectName,
                                                                        java.lang.String methodName,
                                                                        java.lang.Object args,
                                                                        MultiMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Create a method call based on a body that we are parsing from a POST body or WebSocket message for example.
        Parameters:
        address - address of method (this can override what is in the body)
        returnAddress - return address, which is a moniker for where we want to return the results
        objectName - name of the object (optional)
        methodName - name of the method (optional)
        args - arguments and possibly more (could be whole message encoded)
        params - params, usually request parameters
        Returns:
        new method call object returned.

      • createMethodCallByAddress

        default MethodCall<java.lang.Object> createMethodCallByAddress(java.lang.String address,
                                                               java.lang.String returnAddress,
                                                               java.lang.Object args,
                                                               MultiMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Create a method call based on a body that we are parsing from a POST body or WebSocket message for example.
        Parameters:
        address - address of method (this can override what is in the body)
        returnAddress - return address, which is a moniker for where we want to return the results
        args - arguments and possibly more (could be whole message encoded)
        params - params, usually request parameters
        Returns:
        new method call object returned.

      • createMethodCallToBeEncodedAndSent

        default MethodCall<java.lang.Object> createMethodCallToBeEncodedAndSent(long id,
                                                                        java.lang.String address,
                                                                        java.lang.String returnAddress,
                                                                        java.lang.String objectName,
                                                                        java.lang.String methodName,
                                                                        long timestamp,
                                                                        java.lang.Object body,
                                                                        MultiMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Creates a method call to be encoded and sent. This is usually called by a client (local or remote proxy).
        Parameters:
        id - id of method call
        address - address of method
        returnAddress - return address, which is a moniker for where we want to return the results
        objectName - name of the object (optional)
        methodName - name of the method (optional)
        timestamp - when we sent this message
        body - arguments (could be a list or an array)
        params - additional parameters associated with this method call.
        Returns:
        method call that we are sending

      • createLocalProxy

        default <T> T createLocalProxy(java.lang.Class<T> serviceInterface,
                               java.lang.String serviceName,
                               ServiceBundle serviceBundle)
        Create a local client proxy
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of proxy
        Parameters:
        serviceInterface - client interface to client
        serviceName - name of the client that we are proxying method calls to.
        serviceBundle - name of client bundle
        Returns:
        new proxy object

      • createRemoteProxyWithReturnAddress

        default <T> T createRemoteProxyWithReturnAddress(java.lang.Class<T> serviceInterface,
                                                 java.lang.String uri,
                                                 java.lang.String serviceName,
                                                 java.lang.String returnAddressArg,
                                                 Sender<java.lang.String> sender,
                                                 BeforeMethodCall beforeMethodCall,
                                                 int requestBatchSize)
        Create a remote proxy using a sender that knows how to send method body over wire
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of client
        Parameters:
        serviceInterface - client view of client
        uri - uri of client
        serviceName - name of the client that we are proxying method calls to.
        returnAddressArg - return address
        sender - how we are sending the message over the wire
        beforeMethodCall - before method call
        Returns:
        remote proxy

      • createMethodCallToBeParsedFromBody

        default MethodCall<java.lang.Object> createMethodCallToBeParsedFromBody(java.lang.String addressPrefix,
                                                                        java.lang.Object message,
                                                                        Request<java.lang.Object> originatingRequest)
        Parses a method call using an address prefix and a body. Useful for Websocket calls and POST calls (if you don't care about request params).
        Parameters:
        addressPrefix - prefix of the address
        message - message that we are sending
        originatingRequest - the request that caused this method to be created
        Returns:
        method call that we just created

                                                                                            java.lang.Object body,
                                                                                            Request<java.lang.Object> originatingRequest)

        Request request
        Parameters:

        args - args
